    • Method Detail

      • getRelevantAgents

        java.util.Collection<? extends Agent> getRelevantAgents(VCircle relevantArea,
                                                        Agent pedestrian,
                                                        Topography topography)
        Computes the pedestrians possessing a potential that reaches into the given relevantArea.
        Parameters:
        pedestrian - the pedestrian in the center of the relevant area. It can be used to determine if some pedestrians have special relation (like group member) that would change the potential value.
        scenario - the current scenario to enable the PotentialFieldAgent to search for the relevant pedestrians.
